Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Slash = Tool:WaitForChild("Slash") LaserShot = Tool:WaitForChild("LaserShot")
LaserSound = Handle:WaitForChild("LaserSound") SlashSound = Handle:WaitForChild("SlashSound")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Equipped = false
SlashDamage = 15 LaserDamage = 65 ReloadTime = 1
LastClick = 0 Clicks = 0
SpecialDebounce = false SpecialReload = 3
Grips = { NormalGrip = CFrame.new(0.25, 0, 1.54999995, 1, 8.90109959e-008, -0, -8.90109959e-008, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0.99999994), LaserShotGrip = CFrame.new(0.5, 0, 1, 0.707106769, -0, 0.707106769, 0, 1, 0, -0.707106769, 0, 0.707106769) }
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Attack() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false SlashAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Slash) if SlashAnim then SlashSound:Play() SlashAnim:Play(0.1, nil, nil) Delay(0.9, function() if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Stop() end end) end wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function DoubleClick() SpecialCoolDown = true LaserShotAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(LaserShot) if LaserShotAnim then LaserShotAnim:Play() end Tool.Grip = Grips.LaserShotGrip wait(0.5) if Equipped then SlashSound:Stop() LaserSound:Play() local Laser = Instance.new("Part") Laser.Name = "Laser" Laser.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Lime green") Laser.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Laser.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Laser.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Laser.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Laser.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Laser.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 5, 0.2) Laser.Locked = true Laser.Anchored = false Laser.CanCollide = false Laser.Transparency = 0 local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Head Mesh.Parent = Laser local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, Laser:GetMass() * 196.20, 0) BodyForce.Parent = Laser local HandleClone = Handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame - HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * 0.125 local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Z / 2) + 0) local HandleCloneX = HandleCloneZ:Clone() HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame - HandleCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * (HandleClone.Size.X / 2) Debris:AddItem(Laser, 5) Laser.Touched:connect(function(Hit) print(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit ~= Handle then Laser:Destroy() local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(LaserDamage) end end end) Laser.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local TargetPoint = (HandleCloneX.CFrame + HandleCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * 1) Laser.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * (Laser.Size.Y / 2) Laser.Velocity = CFrame.new(Handle.Position, (Handle.CFrame + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * 2).p).lookVector * 100 wait(1) if LaserShotAnim then LaserShotAnim:Stop() end Tool.Grip = Grips.NormalGrip wait(SpecialReload) SpecialCoolDown = false end end
function Blow(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then local right_arm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if right_arm then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint and (joint.Part0 == Handle or joint.Part1 == Handle) then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(SlashDamage) end end end end end
function Activated() local Tick = tick() if LastClick == 0 or (Tick - LastClick) <= 0.25 and not SpecialCoolDown then LastClick = Tick Clicks = Clicks + 1 if Clicks >= 2 then LastClick = 0 Clicks = 0 if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Stop() end DoubleClick() else Attack() end else Attack() Clicks = 1 LastClick = Tick end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Humanoid then return end Equipped = true if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false Tool.Grip = Grips.NormalGrip if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Stop() end if LaserShotAnim then LaserShotAnim:Stop() end end
Handle.Touched:connect(Blow)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
